Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The frequencies with which we detected mutations were 5 ( 14 % ) of 35 in sporadic cases and 8 ( 80 % ) of 10 in familial cases . .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| sporadic cases |
| familial cases |

The two disease entities found in the paragraph are "sporadic cases" and "familial cases". These terms are used to describe different types of disease occurrences.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The other terms in the paragraph, such as "mutations" and "percentage", do not refer to specific diseases and are not included in the table.
